original: Kollen, Joel, ingenjör, Hultafors, f. 2/11/82 i Sthlm av ing. Hilmer K. o. Alice Lindgren. G. 05 m. Ester Andersson. Barn: Hilmer f. 08, Arne 09, Ingvar 10, Anna-Maja 12, Bertil 14, Ulla 19, Kurt 21. — Utex. fr. CTI 03. Stud:res. o. ing:prakt. i Tyskl. o. Engl. Inneh. av Sv. Mått- o. Tum-stocksfabr. i Hultafors samt Hultafors kraftv. Komm. rev. sed. 13, led. av tax:ndn sed. 13 o. av komm:fullm. sed. 19, ordf. i styr. f. Borås Banks avd:-kont. i Hultafors.
translated: Kollen, Joel, engineer, Hultafors, b. 2/11/82 in Stockholm to engineer Hilmer K. and Alice Lindgren. Married in 1905 to Ester Andersson. Children: Hilmer, b. 1908; Arne, b. 1909; Ingvar, b. 1910; Anna-Maja, b. 1912; Bertil, b. 1914; Ulla, b. 1919; Kurt, b. 1921. — Graduated from CTI in 1903. Studied and worked as an engineer in Germany and England. Owner of Swedish Measurement and Inch-Ruler Factory in Hultafors, and Hultafors power plant. Appointed to the municipal council in 1913 and served as a member of the tax board since 1913. Chairman of the board of directors for Borås Bank's branch office in Hultafors.
